entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Activity.SetParentId()`allows creation of `ActivitySpanId` that breaks `==` expectations #101219
  • Threads 99% of the Blocked causing slowdown #101216
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for invalid annotations in top-level methods #101215
  • ILLink analyzer produces dataflow warnings even for invalid annotations #101211
  • unable to detect Socket.Send failures #101210
  • [wasm] Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests #101204
    9.0.0
  • Trim/AOT analyzer missing some ILC warnings #101203
  • [API Proposal]: TypeDescriptor-related trimming support #101202
    9.0.0
  • Support Windows 10 for System.Net.Quic #101200
  • Trimmer, NativeAOT, and Trim analyzer have inconsistent UnsafeAccessor behavior #101195
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Chunk method #101194
  • Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101193
  • Trim analyzer doesn't perform dataflow analysis on backing field #101191
    Future
  • TimeSpan.Parse(string) converts hour values > 24 to day values #101187
  • It is possible to create an InterpolatedStringHandler that will accept non-interpolated strings? #101185
  • Behaviour of GC HeapHardLimit #101183
  • Assert correct HttpRequestError in tests #101177
  • JIT: IV widening does not kick in for simple foreach over `List<int>` #101176
    9.0.0
  • Codegen generates code referencing RuntimeType for `__Canon[]` #101175
  • RunAOTCompilation will cause calling to wasm export function throws a "uninitialized element" error #101170
  • [browser] move console proxy from runtime code into test-main #101169
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] TimeZoneInfoTests.ChangeLocalTimeZone not thread safe #101166
    9.0.0
  • CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo(string) -> cache pollution bug #101165
  • Backport of #95390 (SignedXml.CheckSignature failing for valid Enveloped signature) seems to have failed #101163
  • JIT: cmp + jump + jump #101160
    Future
  • What's the recommended way to serialize a customized exception in .NET 8+ #101159
  • How to use CoSetProxyBlanket in P/Invoke source generator? #101157
  • ConvertDllsToWebCil fails ugly for invalid assembly #101154
    9.0.0
  • Investigate ways to make GC stress compatible with WaitForPendingFinalizers #101150

Closed

  • LNK2001 Error When Linking Static Library with NativeAOT Project #101209
  • [net9.0-preview3]: NativeAOT System.Text.Json throws "System.NotSupportedException: 'System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonDerivedTypeAttribute[]' is missing native code or metadata." #101205
  • System.Net.HttpListener.Tests failure: Expected _associatedHttp11ConnectionCount=0 > _availableHttp11Connections.Count=0 #95220
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json failing some large file tests #59678
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests on Mono_Minijit_Debug-Ubuntu #100715
  • [Mono] App crashes with BadImageFormatException: Method has no body #101074
    9.0.0
  • Expose content length decoder on AsnDecoder #101125
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT Fails On Windows For Paths With a Space #101055
    9.0.0
  • JIT: CSE removes throwing modulo computation on x86 #101028
    9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] WBT tests disabled, till a new sdk is available #77740
    7.0.x
  • Loop condition vs initial guard check impacts bounds checking #83349
    9.0.0
  • [Jit] Loop condition doesn't elide bounds check #9422
    9.0.0
  • Mono Wasm V8 System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests failure #100830
  • [browser][mt] SignalRClientTests timeouts #100388
    9.0.0
  • [System.Convert]::FromBase64String causes memory leak with large strings #101061
  • [cdac] Enable the DAC to delegate operations to the cDAC #99301
    9.0.0
  • Add HttpClient tests for doing client authentication with a certificate with no private key #19079
  • [HttpListener] HttpListener tests are blocking xunit workers, causing hangs #21870
  • HttpListener on Unix doesn't track amount of data written to output stream #21918
  • [HttpListener][Managed] HttpListenerWebSocketContext close handshakes should not fail #22015
  • Eliminate code duplication between HttpUtility and WebUtility #22175
  • [LSRA] Further tuning of preferencing is needed #11959

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Optimize out references to a bunch of BCL methods during JS interop startup #101217
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add tests for dataflow with invalid annotations #101214
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add `alpine` to target triplet for crossbuild #101213
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Preserve static type info for return value of ctor #101212
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter option table updates #101207
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix a compiler error on alpine-arm64 #101206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update queues. #101198
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reuse more templates in our build #101197
    area-Infrastructure
  • Tensor prototype #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Allow user to specify a rundown keyword to override the default. #101189
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disallow frozen `RuntimeType` for canonical types #101173
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/6.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101167
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove defensive copies in `System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext` #101161
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix generic runtime lookup expansion in Tier0 #101153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts before NOP change #101152
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Update locker.yml #101218
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads" #101123
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Move first chance exception notification so the !pe works #101190
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF][Release/6.0] Update queues. #101201
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF][Release/8.0] Update queues. #101094
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #99695
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.x
  • Keep our System.Text.Json version used in HostModel in sync with MSBuild #101199
    area-HostModel
  • Improve resiliency of custom attribute parsing #101164
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use likelihoods in block reordering decision #101132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove regex tests blocking on async calls #100982
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows/Linux #101109
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [docs] Document tools tests workflow #101186
    documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101168
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add AsnDecoder {Try}DecodeLength #101141
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • JIT: Model JIT helper exceptions correctly in VN #101062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] New ABI classifiers #101114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] install Firefox on helix #101171
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check and make overflow check more precise #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] easy prep for Firefox #101138
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0 #100994
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • Insert a breakpoint instruction after throwing calls #101037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Changed GetNetworkInterfaces method to to retrieve information related to all interfaces #100824
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run DependencyInjection trimming tests as native AOT. #101129
    linkable-framework, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing explicit frame pop on arm32 #101147
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101144
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] rename WasmTestOnChrome #101140
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid some defensive copies on readonly structs in System.Net.Quic #101133
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0][mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #100810
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections
  • Only add interface methods to _virtual_methods cache #101139
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
